::Fidgit::

She woke up and sat up on her bunk.  She yawned and walked out of her room 
and down the hallway.  She happen to pass by the armory and saw Beachcomber 
in there getting weapons.  She stood in the door way loking at Beachcomber. 
She drew her little dagger and kept it at her side.
"May I ask what you are doing here? And why are you taking our weapons?"
She gave him a stern look.  She had never met him before and was extremely 
wary of him. He looked like he could kill her if he wanted to, but if he was 
an intruder, she would make sure she took him with her into the afterlife.

------------Original Message-------------
   <KSLawdogg@c...>
Date: Fri Jun 23, 2000 1:43pm
Subject: Neo Beast Wars RPG


Beachcomber:




Beachcomber entered the armory of the Ark, taking out a heavy laser rifle.  
Setting the rifle down after getting some power cells for it, he took out a 
chain gun.  Taking out two bandoliers of shells and wrapping them around one 
shoulder and across the chest in one direction, the other in an opposite 
direction.  Putting the chain gun in subspace, he picked up the heavy laser 
rifle, taking two grenades and putting them in subspace, stepping to the 
side, he waited for the others on guard duty to get weapons.
